channel.title: My life as a father, photography and ride-share driver.
channel.description: My life as a father, photography and ride-share driver.

item.title: Family
item.description:
Family

Because of the trajedy my brothers an aunt had to face in     2015, we've had to come together to take care of my mother and fathers personal belongings. it not only did that but it also made me see the importance of getting things in order for my own passing.

item.title: Another Year Gone
item.description:
Another Year Gone

We've come to the end of another year and so it goes. This year has been a difficult one for me personally. Trying to find a suitable job, the death of my parents, and the loss of some friends has taken a toll on me over the year.
